title: Velkommen til denne fantastiske 5-v√¶relses bolig i Nordhavn!
description:
Velkommen til Provianthuset!
Vi har nu forn√∏jelsen af udleje denne store 5-v√¶relses lejlighed, beliggende i det eftertragtede √Örhusgadekvarteret.
I denne dejlige lejlighed f√•r man 4 gode sovev√¶relser, et dejligt badev√¶relse samt et stort k√∏kken, en rummelig stue med udgang til boligens altan.
Gamle mursten har givet nyt liv i Provianthuset.
Provianthusets smukke ydre er skabt med hj√¶lp fra murstenene der oprindeligt stammer fra gamle bygninger p√• Carlsberg, der er blevet revet ned.
Herefter er stenene n√¶nsomt renset og fragtet til Nordhavn, hvor de nu udg√∏r murv√¶rket i Provianthuset. Metoden med at genbruge kulbr√¶ndte teglsten giver bygningen et helt s√¶rligt smukt patineret og rustikt udtryk, men genbruget har samtidig ogs√• store milj√∏m√¶ssige fordele. Der spares v√¶sentlige m√¶ngder CO2 ved ikke at bruge ny producerede sten, og selve afrensningen af stenen sker ved mekanisk vibrationsteknologi uden hverken brug af vand eller kemikalier.
Stenene b√¶rer historien i sig, sikrer vision√¶rt byggeri og er samtidig garanteret lige s√• st√¶rk og holdbar som nye sten.
I omr√•det ved den gamle Frihavn ligger smukke, gamle havnebygninger, siloer og kajanl√¶g side om side med sp√¶ndende nybyggerier og skaber kontrast, liv og international stemning. Erhverv, boliger og butikker blander sig og g√∏r omr√•det til et trygt sted at v√¶re - hele d√∏gnet.
Engang l√• Rhedhavnen her, hvorfra proviant blev sejlet ud til tr√¶skibe fort√∏jet p√• Rheden. Stadig i dag spiller havnen en vigtig rolle i kvarteret og kun f√• skridt fra din hovedd√∏r kan du dyppe t√¶erne i det skvulpende vand, mens du kigger ud mod √òresund og tr√¶kker havluft dybt ned i lungerne.
Lejem√•lets lejeperiode er ubegr√¶nset. Lejem√•let kan ikke opsiges de f√∏rste 12 m√•neder, herefter er der 3 m√•neders opsigelse.
Husdyr ikke tilladt.

title: Unique furnished apartment in the heart of Copenhagen
description:
The apartment is available from July 14 for a one-year lease, with possibility of extension.

We are looking for a single person or a couple. It is not suitable for families or sharing, and pets are not allowed.

This three-room corner apartment is located in a rare building in old town Copenhagen with a spectacular view of the historical Nikolaj Church. The apartment has the full corner of the building and is situated on the 3rd floor allowing plenty of light from six windows facing the street and two windows facing the rooftops and Parliament building. The fully equipped kitchen and bathroom are newly renovated. The large and bright living room features an old fireplace, inbuilt shelves, a desk, a solid oak wood table with space for six people, a two-seater sofa, and chairs from &tradition. All furniture and lighting are high-quality contemporary design. The kitchen is equipped with a Dishwasher, oven, washing machine, microwave oven, and the apartment has a lot of inbuilt storage space. The bedroom has a tall double bed and a closet fitting-room style. The middle room is an 18th-century service hall remade as a guest room with a daybed. 

We are a Swedish/Danish couple renting out the Apartment on a long term basis because we are living in New York. You can visit the apartment by contacting us here.

title: Delevenlig lejlighed p√• S√∏borg Hovedgade
description:
R√¶kkehusene er i et- eller to-plan. Alle boligerne er indrettet med et k√∏kken-alrum i √•ben forbindelse med stue og direkte adgang til boligens store terrasse. R√¶kkehusene har derudover badev√¶relse og 2 eller 3 v√¶relser. I r√¶kkehusene i to-plan, finder du k√∏kken-alrum og toilet i stuen og tre v√¶relser samt boligens badev√¶relse p√• f√∏rste sal.

Hver bolig har en terrasse med flisebel√¶gning, hvorfra der er udsigt til de omkringliggende gr√∏nne f√¶llesarealer. De skr√•nende omr√•der med vild beplantning skaber rolige omgivelser og et minimum af vedligehold. Der er tilmed plantet b√¶rbuske og frugttr√¶er i f√¶llesarealerne til gl√¶de for alle Engdragets beboere.

H√•rde hvidevarer
Der er alt i h√•rde hvidevarer inklusive opvaskemaskine, t√∏rretumbler og vaskemaskine.

Husdyr
Lejere kan ans√∏ge om tilladelse til at holde indekat og hund p√• adressen. Udekatte er ikke tilladt. Kontakt os for mere information.

title: H√∏j kvalitets lejlighed med stor altan og fantastisk udsigt
description: Beliggende p√• 3. sal i 'Gemini-Residence' er denne pragtfulde udsigtslejlighed nu til leje. Lejligheden er sydvendt og har flere udgange til en stor overd√¶kket altan p√• ca. 45 m2 med en fantastisk udsigt over Amager F√¶lled, Islands Brygge og havneforl√∏bet og vandet i K√∏benhavns Havn. En absolut s√¶rlig lejlighed.Man ankommer med elevator til 3. sal. Her er videre gang til lejlighedens entre. N√•r man tr√¶der ind i lejligheden, ankommer man i stort stuerum. Her rammes man med det samme af det imponerende naturlige lysindfald og drages af den fremragende udsigt af gulv til loft-vinduespartierne. Entr√©en g√•r direkte ud til det √•bne stuerum, hvor der er god plads til at indrette b√•de spise- og opholdsstue. K√∏kkenet er ligeledes i √•ben forbindelse og er udstyret med en flytbar k√∏kken√∏ og alle n√∏dvendige h√•rde hvidevarer.Fra stuerummet er udgang til den store, aflange altan. Her er god mulighed for at indrette flere afdelinger og sektioner - og udnytte lyset i l√∏bet af hele dagen. Her er en fremragende udsigt til b√•de vand, land og by - og et evigt levende bybillede at f√∏lge med i. Yderligere er her meget privat, da man er h√¶vet over alle √∏vrige bebyggelser i n√¶romr√•det.Der forefindes to gode sovev√¶relser i hver sin ende af lejligheden. De er begge udf√∏rt med indbyggede skabe og har begge udgang til den store altan. Det ene sovev√¶relse har direkte adgang til det prim√¶re badev√¶relse, der er udstyret med separat bruseniche og vaskemaskine og t√∏rretumbler. Yderligere forefindes et g√¶stebadev√¶relse med separat bruseniche.Til lejlighed medf√∏lger privat p-plads i p-k√¶lderen samt privat k√¶lderrum.Udlejes ikke som delebolig.Forbrugsudgifter er ikke inkluderet i huslejen.

The apartment is available for rent for a limited period from May 20, 2025, to June 1, 2026. There is a possibility of extension, as I will be working in Jutland.

The apartment is rented out fully furnished, and electricity, water, heating, and internet (fiber) are included in the rent.

The living room includes a height-adjustable desk, a sofa, and a dining set. A new floor was installed over the Easter holidays.
The kitchen is equipped with a dishwasher and a washing machine.
The bathroom has a sit-in bathtub and a new toilet.
The bedroom features a relatively new, fixed double bed (180x200cm).
The balcony is currently unfurnished due to ongoing roof renovations on the building. The project is expected to be completed by the end of July.

The apartment is located on a quiet street, close to grocery stores, public transport, the cozy Stefansgade neighborhood, and N√∏rrebroparken. It is possible to rent a parking space in a private underground parking garage.

Pets and smoking are not allowed.

Note: The rental contract is non-terminable for the first 6 months for both tenant and landlord. After that, the standard notice period under Danish rental law applies: 1 month‚Äôs notice from the tenant.

If you‚Äôre interested, please write a few words about yourself.

Viewings will take place in person on May 17 between 9 AM and 2 PM.

Please note that I‚Äôm currently traveling until May 16, so my response time may be a bit longer than usual.

-----

Historic charm and modern comfort in the heart of Copenhagen

This apartment on Gammel Strand 3. floor in Copenhagen is an impressive 182 m¬≤ home that combines historic charm with modern conveniences. The location is ideal, with a view of Thorvaldsens Museum, Christiansborg (Danish Parliament), the canal and close to the lively atmosphere at Str√∏get (the main walking street), as well as Metro Station, restaurants and all the other temptations of Copenhagen.

The apartment has six rooms, including 2-3 bedrooms, which are perfect for both families and those who want space for guests or a home office. 
The apartment has been carefully renovated with a focus on preserving the original details, such as stucco ceilings, beautiful wood paneling and classic windows that fill the rooms with natural light.
In addition, the apartment contains a stylish bathroom and separate toilet that are modern, but still in harmony with the historic character of the property. With its blend of elegance and comfort, this apartment is a unique home in the heart of Copenhagen, offering a rare opportunity to live in one of the city's most desirable areas.

title: Bright & fully furnished flat on Islandsbrygge!
description:
Hello future tenant. If you're looking for a modern and cozy flat in the heart of Copenhagen, look no further! This newly renovated apartment has an AMAZING location only a few blocks from the waterfront and Islandsbrygge metro station.

FURNITURE: The flat comes FULLY FURNISHED with a queen-sized bed, 2 SMART TVs, 2 leather couches, a work desk, ample closet space and a dining table. Basic amenities such as dishes, cutlery, lamps, mirrors, chairs, etc. are also included. The apartment has a nice newly constructed balcony and is situated on the 3rd floor. The building has an elevator and a shared wash-room in the basement which is very reasonably priced. 

THE AREA: Islandsbrygge is an extremely safe and popular part of Copenhagen to live in. The apartment is located in the "cozy area" with heaps of local shops, boutiques and grocery stores in the neighborhood. The waterfront - which is a popular spot to enjoy the sun, jump in the water, play sports, bar-BQ on the grass, etc, - is located only a block away from the apartment. Close by is Langebro connecting you to the city center with Tivoli, City hall, Central Train station and the main Shopping street. All of which is only a 5-10 min bike ride away.

AVAILABILITY: The apartment is available for move-in from the 1 of July, 2025.

THE IDEAL TENANT: I'm looking for someone who is clean, honest, has a stable income and will treat the apartment and its neighbors respectfully.¬†The flat is NOT suited for friends to share, however, a couple would be fine (this would be subject to an additional 850 kr./month to cover increased expenditures of water, electricity, wear & tear, etc.).

VIEWING: If you are interested in a viewing, please contact me with a bit of info about yourself (including: occupation, nationality, desired move-in date, etc) and I will reach out ASAP. 

Thanks for your interest, I look forward to hearing from you.
- Chresten

title: Dejlig 2 v√¶r. med sydvendt altan ud til det gr√∏nne g√•rdrum

K√∏kkenet er udstyret med alt i moderne h√•rde hvidevarer, herunder kogeplade, k√∏le-/fryseskab, indbygningsovn og opvaskemaskine.

Badev√¶relset er indrettet med flotte, store gr√• fliser og en separat bruseniche. Der er naturligvis ogs√• plads til vaskemaskine og t√∏rretumbler. 

Ejendommen:

Der er parkeringsk√¶lder under ejendommen, hvor man har mulighed for at leje en p-plads. 

Solhusene st√•r til at blive DGNB guld-certificeret. Det er din garanti for at flytte ind i en ejendom, hvor der er t√¶nkt p√• milj√∏et samt din sundhed og trivsel. Her er blandt andet anvendt milj√∏venlige materialer og s√∏rget for et godt indeklima.

Her f√•r du en nem og praktisk hverdag, med kort afstand til b√•de skole, daginstitutioner, offentlig transport og indk√∏bsmuligheder. Blandt andet ligger n√¶rmeste supermarked lige rundt om hj√∏rnet i nabobygningen. Tilmed ligger tilk√∏rslen til Hiller√∏dmotorvejen blot ca. 2 minutters k√∏rsels v√¶k, s√• du er dermed godt forbundet til det hele, uanset om det er med bilen eller S-toget du skal afsted.  Fra Bagsv√¶rd station er der kun omkring 30 minutter ind til K√∏benhavns H. 

G√•- og l√∏beturen kan for eksempel nydes rundt om Bagsv√¶rd S√∏, eller Hareskoven, hvor roen s√¶nker sig i de smukkeste gr√∏nne omgivelser.

title: Yderst rummelig 3-plans r√¶kkehus i Kunstnerkareen
description:
Familier√¶kkehuse

P√• karr√©ens to lang sider findes 28 sk√∏nne r√¶kkehuse med fem v√¶relser fordelt p√• enten to eller tre etager, der er ideel til b√∏rnefamilier, der dr√∏mmer om eget hus og have ‚Äì stadig med storbyens liv inden for r√¶kkevidde.

Familier√¶kkehusene

¬†er praktisk indrettede med b√•de Tv og internet stik i alle v√¶relser, to badev√¶relser og hyggelige k√∏kken-/alrum. Den lille forhave vender ud mod en stille sidegade og lukkes med havel√•ge, s√• du trygt kan lade de sm√• lege i haven. Derudover er der masser af legekammerater at finde i de andre huse omkring jer.

Kunstnerkarr√©en¬†

passer med sin store diversitet perfekt til b√•de singler, par ‚Äì unge som √¶ldre ‚Äì og b√∏rnefamilier, der dr√∏mmer om en moderne bolig t√¶t p√• b√•de by og natur.

N√•r du lejer en bolig, er det normalt tilf√¶ldigt, hvem du kommer til at bo ved siden af, og det kan nemt skabe gnidninger, hvis man lever lidt for forskellige liv. Derfor har PensionDanmark en intention om at sammens√¶tte mere homogene grupper i de enkelte dele af karr√©en for at fremme f√¶llesskabet og det sociale liv. Og m√•ske ogs√• give mulighed for at samle flere generationer ‚Äì ikke n√∏dvendigvis under samme tag, men i samme karr√©. Jo mere du har tilf√¶lles med de mennesker, der bor omkring dig, jo mere vil I m√•ske komme hinanden ved.

Kunstnerkarr√©en er derfor som udgangspunkt opdelt i tre forskellige typer af beboere. Fordybelse + 40 til dem, der √∏nsker fred og ro, Cityliv + 25 (og bof√¶llesskab) til dem med mere knald p√• hverdagen samt Familier√¶kkehuse til b√∏rnefamilier.

Kunstnerkarr√©en¬†

er opf√∏rt efter de nyeste standarder for b√¶redygtigt byggeri, som blandt andet bidrager til et sundt indeklima. Projektet er certificeret til DGNB Guld, hvilket der indtil nu kun er f√•, der har opn√•et i Danmark.

PensionDanmark har valgt at investere i lige netop denne karr√© i √òrestad Syd, da den ogs√• byder p√• den st√∏rste og mest solrige g√•rdhave. For os er ude rummet meget vigtigt, og derfor har vi skabt et frodigt og indbydende g√•rd rum med blomstrende buske, niveau spring, f√¶lles grill og en sp√¶ndende legeplads. Det er som en hyggelig park, hvor man i trygge omgivelser kan tr√¶kke frisk luft og finde flere mindre opholdssteder, der giver f√∏lelsen af privatliv.

Har du bil, kan du gl√¶de dig over, at Kunstnerkarr√©en, som en af f√• bebyggelser i √òrestad, har sin egen P-k√¶lder med 56 parkeringspladser, s√• du slipper for at g√• flere hundrede meter til offentligt p-hus. Det koster kr. 850,00 pr. m√•ned for en parkeringsplads udover lejen.

P-pladser lejes s√¶rskilt og kun til beboer, og efter f√∏rst til m√∏lleprincippet og der er indg√•et aftale med Clever, om at levere ladestandere, i tilf√¶lde af, at du har en el-bil.

title: 2 v√¶relses Lejlighed p√• 46 m¬≤
description:
OBS! Billeder er fra pr√∏vebolig!

Ejendommen

Bellakvarters nye pejlem√¶rke Bella Tower er tegnet af COBE og Vilhelm Lauritzen Arkitekter, og er et markant isl√¶t for indgangen til Bellakvarter.

det 60 meter h√∏je boligt√•rn er designet i et hvidt grid af r√• betonelementer, som er placeret p√• en m√∏rk murstensbase, der danner rammen omkring et gr√∏nt, naturrigt g√•rdmilj√∏. Boligerne i basen g√•r op til 5. sal og har altaner og tilbagetrukne terrasser ud til g√•rden, mens t√•rnet skyder 19 etager op og har altaner hele vejen rundt.

Ejendommen best√•r af i alt 199 lejligheder med 2-6 v√¶relser. Udsigt over hele √òrestad og Amager F√¶lled.

T√•rnet er tegnet med 360 graders altaner i forskellige dybder, som varierer fra franske altaner til opholdsaltaner. Det giver mulighed for et rigt udeliv, hvor man kan g√• udenfor fra alle v√¶relser og nyde den ubrudte udsigt ud over √òrestad og ind over Amager F√¶lled til K√∏benhavns Skyline.

Boligerne

Boligerne har et stilrent og nordisk look og er opf√∏rt i l√¶kre materialer s√•som flotte egetr√¶sgulve og store vinduespartier. De store vinduespartier giver et dejligt lysindfald og en ubeskrivelig flot udsigt fra t√•rn-lejlighederne.

K√∏kkenet er et kvalitetsk√∏kken fra Invita og i et tidl√∏st design med integrerede h√•rde hvidevarer s√•som indbygningsovn, induktionskogeplade, k√∏le/fryseskab og opvaskemaskine. Alle badev√¶relser er opf√∏rt i lyse materialer og bruseniche med ekstra stort brushoved der indbyder til lange bade og som giver et indtryk af kvalitet og velv√¶re.

Alle boliger har egen vaskemaskine og t√∏rretumbler.

Omr√•det

Bellakvarter er b√¶redygtighedscertificeret inden for DGNB og har som det f√∏rste byomr√•de i Danmark f√•et en Guld-midtvejscertificering. DGNB bygger p√• en helhedsorienteret forst√•else af b√¶redygtighed, der tager h√∏jde for b√•de milj√∏m√¶ssige, √∏konomiske, tekniske, processuelle og sociale faktorer. description:
We are renting out our newly modernized, fully furnished apartment for 4 months, starting from 1st of November 2025 and ending 28th of February 2026. 
The apartment has a combined living-room/kitchen with large windows with lots of natural light and sky view, including a small balcony. In the afternoon you have beautiful sunsets and natural light.
The kitchen is equipped with all the utensils you need for cooking at home, including a dishwasher.
Wi-Fi is included and available for everyone living in the building block.
Together with our friendly neighbors we share two roof-top terraces (one on each building) that are accessible all year round. There are also laundromats in the basement which can be used for a small fee.
The apartment is located in close proximity to 4 supermarkets, well-kept green areas and various restaurant and caf√© areas in the neighborhood. It‚Äôs also well-located to reach Frederiksberg, Assistens Kirkeg√•rd, the lakes (Peblinge S√∏) and the center of Copenhagen, and has very easy access to public transport (bus and metro).
Electricity, gas and heating is included in the price. However, to avoid excessive use there will be an upper limit based on our own expenses, but somewhat above this limit.
We are looking for responsible people to take care of our apartment while we are away.

description:
Dear Renter

I have my 59 m2 apartment in Vangede/Gentofte, furnished as you see in picture. Right now it is furnished for 2 persons with a sleeping- and and living room, nice kitchen and bathroom. It will ready and furnished from 01.07.2025 as current renter wants to go back to their country after trying living in DK and job situation was not good. It is not for family with kids, better for single or couples.

The apartment will be rented out 1 month at a time with the possibility of extension. The apartment is undersold and you must be open to working with the real estate agent and keeping it neat for viewing.

Deposit is 13.000 dkr. and if you of course treat the apartment nice you will get all money back (I have references here from earlier renters). Price is including Internet and please note there is no TV, but you are welcome bring one.

Hope you like the design of funishing and check out the area. There are busses close and 25 minutes to center of Cph.

English:
Large, lovely 3-room residence with 2 spacious rooms, a living room connected to an open kitchen, a beautiful bathroom, and a large, south-facing balcony with a fantastic view.

The apartment is located on the 3rd floor at the corner/gable of a modern property centrally on Islands Brygge. It is well distanced from all neighbors and has a lovely view of a green wedge, plenty of sky, and the water of Copenhagen's canals while being set back enough that the lively atmosphere of Brygge does not disturb.

Upon entering the apartment, you step into a spacious hallway with room for outerwear. From there, you have access to a large living area that serves as both a dining and living room. The kitchen is in open connection with the living area and is equipped with a large kitchen island and all necessary appliances. From the living area, there is direct access to a large, covered balcony with furniture and a view of a green area and water. The apartment has two bedrooms; one with built-in closets and both furnished with a bed or sofa bed. The bathroom is large and spacious, tiled with two separate sinks, cabinet space, and a separate shower niche and washing facilities.

The apartment is located minutes from Islands Brygge Metro Station, Dybbelsbro S-train Station, Fisketorvet Shopping Center, and Copenhagen Central Station. There is also easy access to Islands Brygge harbor and swimming area, restaurants, cafes, supermarkets, gyms, and fitness centers all within walking distance, and easy access to the historical Christianshavn and the inner city via Copenhagen's bicycle bridges. A very short distance away lies Amager F√¶lled, which offers beautiful nature and rich wildlife, ideal for picnics, walks, and runs away from the noise and bustle of city life. With Amager F√¶lled's extensive trail system, there is a short distance to, among other places, DR-Byen and the University of Copenhagen.

The property features an open green courtyard with a playground. There is an elevator in the building. The area around the apartment has ample parking opportunities. The apartment is rented out furnished with various kitchen utensils, tableware, etc., and is ready to move into. Internet is included in the rent, while water and heating are paid on account. Other utility expenses such as electricity are not included in the rent. Contact for a viewing today.

Entr√©en ligger i √•ben forbindelse med resten af boligen, og den fremtr√¶der endvidere med god plads til overt√∏jet i det faste skab. I badev√¶relset er der bruseniche og plads til en smart vaskes√∏jle. Sovev√¶relset brillerer med sin sublime st√∏rrelse og det fabelagtige lysindfald.

Lejligheden har:

- Et badev√¶relse med seperat brus og opbevaringsmuligheder.

ENG: LIMITED-TIME RENTAL OF APARTMENT ON THE BORDER BETWEEN VESTERBRO AND FREDERIKSBERG!

I‚Äôm renting out my fully furnished 2-room apartment (approx. 56 square meters) from mid/late July 2025 to early/mid February 2026.

title: Eksklusiv 129m2 lejlighed i Carlsberg Byen perfekt til familier
description:
Denne eksklusive lejlighed p√• 129m2 ligger p√• 1. sal i Kjeldahls Hus, som har en attraktiv beliggenhed i Carlsberg Byen. Carlsberg Byen byder p√• et bredt udvalg af caf√©er, restauranter, indk√∏bsmuligheder og er i g√•afstand til S-tog og metro. 

Bygningen blev bygget i 2021, er tilg√¶ngelig via en elevator og er den ideelle lejlighed til en familie, der s√∏ger komfort og plads. 

Planl√∏sningen har et stort opholdsrum med √•bent k√∏kken + 4 (sove)v√¶relser, 2 moderne badev√¶relser, en altan og en unik lille terrasse med udsigt over et lille, f√¶lles gr√¶sareal. Lejligheden f√•r meget lys, har eksklusive sildebensgulve og k√∏kkenet er udstyret med highend udstyr fra Miele og en Quooker. 

Lejligheden udlejes um√∏bleret. Lejeperiode er op til 2 √•r med mulighed for forl√¶ngelse.

ENGLISH VERSION

This exclusive 129m2 apartment is located on the 1st floor of Kjeldahl House, which is located in an attractive location in Carlsberg Byen.  Carslebrg Byen offers a broad variate of cafes, restaurants, shopping possibilities and and in walking distance to the S-train and metro. 

The building was build in 2021, is accessible through an elevator and is the ideal apartment for a family looking for comfort and space. The floor plan has a large living space with an open kitchen + 4 additional (bed)rooms, 2 modern bathrooms, a balcony and a unique small terrace overlooking a small, shared grass area.
The apartment gets a lot of light, has exclusive herringbone floors and the kitchen is equipped with high end equipment from Miele and a Quooker. 

The apartment is unfurnished. Initial rental period is up to 2 years, with possibility to extend.

Pets and smoking is NOT allowed.

title: Sp√¶ndende 3V lejlighed med altan og udsigt over K√∏benhavn
description:
Ejendommen ligger med bedste beliggenhed i Carlsberg Byen i det attraktive Dahlerups T√•rn p√• 5. sal. I denne ende af Carlsberg Byen, er du t√¶t p√• fantastiske haver som J.C. Jacobsens Have, S√∏ndermarken og Frederiksberg Have samt restauranter, cafeer og specialbutikker. 
Lejligheden er rummelig med sine 94m2 og har flere sp√¶ndende l√∏sninger. Blandt andet er entre og k√∏kken flettet sammen i fin stil med den √•bne lyse stue og sk√∏n udsigt fra altanen over Carlsberg Byen. Her er kig til historiske bygninger og moderne arkitektur. Altanen, der har folde-glasd√∏re vender mod √∏st hvor dagssolen kan nydes. Lejligheden har 2 sovev√¶relser samt badev√¶relse med brus og vaskes√∏jle. Alt i alt en sk√∏n lejlighed i den rigtige ende af Carlsberg Byen. 

---
 
Great 2-bedroom apartment with balcony and view of Copenhagen
With one of the best locations in Carlsberg City, Dahlerups T√•rn near several fantastic gardens such as J.C. Jacobsens Have, S√∏ndermarken and Frederiksberg Have as well as restaurants, cafes and several specialty shops. 
The apartment is located on the 5th floor and with its 94m2 it has an interesting layout and design. NOTE: The images are of a similar residence and property in Carlsberg Byen. The floor plan is accurate.

An exclusive, newly built, and spacious 2-room apartment is now available for rent in the popular Carlsberg Byen, located in H√∏ffings T√•rn.

The apartment features an optimal layout, making full use of every square meter. Upon entering, you step into the kitchen area, which has space for a dining table. From the kitchen and dining area, you have direct access to the apartment‚Äôs French balcony with a folding door‚Äîor through the bedroom‚Äîallowing you to enjoy a view of the rest of Copenhagen.

The kitchen flows seamlessly into the living room, which is set back from the entrance, creating depth and a natural flow throughout the apartment. Adjacent to the living room, you will find the bedroom.
The bathroom is designed with drawer modules, a laundry tower (washing machine and dryer from Miele), and a sink in artificial marble from Marmorline. The walls and floors of the bathroom are adorned with pastel green Mosa tiles.
Overall, this apartment is executed in a minimalist and Nordic style, with great attention to aesthetics. The flooring consists of white-pigmented, lacquered oak planks from BOEN, featuring underfloor heating throughout the entire apartment. The fixtures are from Grohe, and all appliances are from Miele.

Included in the apartment: All appliances, washing machine, dryer, dishwasher, oven, and cooktop.

Included in the property: Basement storage, bicycle storage, and a courtyard area. Parking spaces are available for rent.

title: Flot taglejlighed lige ud til S√∏ndermarken
description:
Lejligheden er p√• 3 v√¶relser og er beliggende p√• 5.sal p√• den absolut bedste beliggenhed i Valby, lige ud til S√∏ndermarken, Carsbergbyen, de hyggelige caf√©er og det varierende handelsliv p√• Valby Langgade. 

Til lejligheden h√∏rer en delvist indeliggende terrasse, en stor og anvendelig hems samt et depotrum p√• ca. 4,5 m2 i k√¶lderen. 

Ejendommen er indrettet med eksklusive materialer og i meget h√∏j arkitektonisk klasse. Der er et hyggeligt og roligt g√•rdareal, med legeplads og gr√∏nne rekreative arealer. 

Lejligheden er nyopf√∏rt og indflytningsklar og er disponeret med store vinduespartier og kviste og er s√•ledes gennemlyst og forsynet med rigtig gode lysforhold. Rumh√∏jden er ca.2,80 m hvilket giver fornemmelse af rigeligt med luft og plads og der er flere steder √•bent til kip. 

God og funktionel planl√∏sning med stort √•bent k√∏kken/alrum indrettet med eksklusivt Svanek√∏kken i hvide elementer og h√•rde hvidevarer fra Siemens. I k√∏kken/alrummet er der tillige en indeliggende terrasse mod S√∏ndermarken. Stor lys stue, som er meget let at indrette. Sovev√¶relset er med indbyggede skabe, ligeledes fra Svane. V√¶relset er udstyret med tagvindue fra Velux som kan √•bnes og omdannes til en lille altan, 

Lejlighedens badev√¶relse byder p√• bruseniche med indbygget armatur og stort "Rainshower" brusehoved, badem√∏bel fra Svane indeholdende bordplade med ist√∏bt vask samt vaskemaskine og t√∏rretumbler. 

Lejligheden har flotte egetr√¶sgulve med gulvvarme overalt. 

En helt igennem unik bolig med den bedste placering i Valby.

title: 2-v√¶relses lejebolig i Herlev
description:
Velkommen til Bakkek√¶ret!
√ÖBENT HUS:
Bakkek√¶ret:
Find din nye lejebolig blandt de 445 lejeboliger. Her er et husrum til dig, der har brug for at b√∏rnene f√•r eget v√¶relse. Til parret, der vil have ekstra god plads. Til jer, der vil downsize. Til dem der vil bo alene. Til dem der vil bo sammen.
Frem for alt er der plads til alle livsfaser og dr√∏mme i Bakkek√¶rets f√¶llesskab mellem dig, naboer og naturen.
Etape 5: Boligerne bliver f√¶rdige i 6 etaper og denne bolig ligger i ejendommens femte etape med indflytning 1. juni 2025.
G√•rdrum og f√¶llesskab:
Bakkek√¶rets hjerte er det gr√∏nne bakkedrag i g√•rdrummet, hvor gr√¶sset vokser til, tr√¶erne b√¶rer frugt og urtehaverne kan dyrkes. Her kan b√∏rnene udforske naturen og tumle p√• legepladsen eller du kan nyde en fredelig kop kaffe i en varm solplet.
Med tre orangerier, tagterrasser og et f√¶lleshus p√• 400 m2, er der skabt rum til b√•de alenetid, familietid og hyggetid.
Herlev:
Lige rundt om hj√∏rnet fra Bakkek√¶ret finder du Herlev Bymidte og Herlev Bygade. Her kan du klare hverdagens indk√∏b, men kan ogs√• finde restauranter, t√∏jbutikker, fris√∏r og meget mere. Du kan g√• en tur p√• det lille str√∏g ved Herlev Torv eller bes√∏ge butikkerne i Herlev Bymidte Center. Kun et par minutter fra bymidten ligger ogs√• BIG Shopping, hvor du kan finde bl.a. byggemarked, en biograf og et legeland for de mindste.
Forestil dig at bo et sted, hvor du kan have naturen og alt hvad du skal bruge i hverdagslivet t√¶t p√• ‚Äì og samtidig have K√∏benhavn inden for r√¶kkevidde. Hop p√• cyklen, ind i bilen eller S-toget p√• Herlev Station, og kom let p√• arbejde. G√• en tur i en af byens mange parker eller dyrk outdoor-livet i et af de gr√∏nne naturomr√•der.
Praktisk:
Derudover f√•r du:
- Elevator i bygningen
- Depotrum i k√¶lder eller plint
- Det er muligt at leje en p-plads i k√¶lderen (der er ogs√• el ladepladser)
Det med sm√•t:
- Det er ikke tilladt at st√• i RKI
- K√¶ledyr skal godkendes af udlejer
- Bem√¶rk, at billedmaterialet ikke n√∏dvendigvis stammer fra den p√•g√¶ldende bolig

title: FULLY FURNISHED 3 BEDROOM APARTMENT FOR RENT FOR 1 YEAR FROM JULY 2025
description:
The apartment is located in the best location in Copenhagen right by Enghave Plads in Vesterbro. 

It is ideal for a couple and includes a bedroom, dining room, living room, kitchen and bath. The apartment is 86 m2. 

The apartment will be available from 1 July 2025 (earlier takeover can be arranged) and for a period of 12 months with the possibility to extend with 1-2 months. 

It is located in the loveliest area of Copenhagen surrounded by cafes and green areas with easy access to the city center.

title: Apartment available in the inner city of Copenhagen
description:
MOVE IN DATE 9th JUNE 2026.

Looking for a home in the inner city - then look no further!

The apartment is close to Town Hall Square, Str√∏get, which means that all necessities are within walking distance.

The apartment itself is located on Vestergade on the 2nd floor. Vestergade is known as one of Copenhagen's liveliest streets.

The apartment consists of two rooms of 21 sqm, a smaller room 15 sqm, a kitchen of about 8 sqm and a bathroom 5 sqm, which totals to 64 sqm. The kitchen is equipped with the necessary utensils that a modern kitchen contains. The bathroom is a small classical Copenhagen bathroom, fitted with a shower and a wall-mounted toilet.

As can be seen in the pictures, the apartment is partially furnished. The apartment will include furniture such as: bed, bedside table, dining table & folding chairs, sofa, TV table, clothes rack, ceiling lamps, curtains, fridge, oven and hob. 

Prices are as follows: Entire apartment of 64 sqm: DKK 14,500 + DKK 700. The price of water has been determined to DKK 700, however, in case of overuse extra charges could occur. Electricity is based on your monthly usage. Wifi is available at extra charge.

Note: It should be pointed out that the apartment does not include all objects which can be seen in the pictures.

When contacting, please inform us with the following text: 

Name of tenants, age, expected move-in and move-out date. Also You write a little about yourself and what you do on a daily basis.

title: HELT ny 2-v√¶relses med k√¶mpe tagterrasse
description:

Dine h√•rde hvidevarer er af m√¶rket Vestfrost, som leverer k√∏le-/fryseskab, opvaskemaskine, ovn og induktionskogeplade med 4 sektioner.

Badev√¶relset er i tr√•d med den h√∏je kvalitet, som kendetegner boligen. P√• gulv og i bruseniche er der matte, m√∏rkegr√• klinker, der elegant spiller sammen med de tilsvarende fliser p√• v√¶ggene. Det v√¶gh√¶ngte og vandsparende toilet med soft luk fra Villeroy & Boch har indbygningscisterne.

This beautifully designed apartment offers two spacious balconies and sun from morning to evening, along with a view of the water. At the heart of the home is a bright, west-facing kitchen and living area with direct access to a large balcony where you can enjoy sun until evening. 
The apartment includes a west-facing bedroom, a hallway with practical built-in storage, and two east-facing bedrooms, one of which features its own private balcony ideal for soaking in the morning sun. For added convenience, there's also a private storage unit in the basement.
Residents have access to a fantastic range of shared facilities, including a rooftop terrace with panoramic views, a small community room, a cozy courtyard with green spaces and a children‚Äôs play area, and even a dedicated activity zone with table tennis , kayak and bicycle storage‚Äî offering a true taste of the Nordhavn lifestyle.
Located right by Sundmolen, and just steps from the lively √Örhusgade district, the apartment is close to supermarkets, a luxury cinema, boutique shops, and a variety of caf√©s. With two Metro stations nearby, you‚Äôre well connected to the rest of Copenhagen, and the area offers several excellent parking garages.
. (Note: furniture differs from what is shown in the photos.)

Great apartment with magnificent views of Kongens Have (park)

Do you dream of living in an amazing apartment where historical charm meets modern comfort? This impressive 185 m¬≤ apartment is located in a historic property in the middle of Copenhagen, and offers the perfect combination of classic elegance and modern functionality.
The apartment is located in the popular street S√∏lvgade, right next to Kongens Have ‚Äì one of Copenhagen‚Äôs most beautiful green oases. Here you are close to everything Copenhagen has to offer, while at the same time enjoying the peace and quiet that the area around Kongens Have offers.
The property has been carefully renovated, and the exterior restoration includes, among other things, a beautiful new roof in Valisian slate, which supports the building‚Äôs historical value. Inside, the apartment has been modernized with great respect for the original details, which have been restored so that they retain their period charm, while the apartment also meets today‚Äôs demands for comfort and functionality.
The apartment offers an impressive and airy atmosphere, where original elements such as beautiful stucco and elegant details go hand in hand with modern solutions. The apartment has three additional bedrooms, a well-equipped kitchen with dining area, a small pantry and a spacious bathroom with shower, washer and dryer. Good insulation of the property ensures a good indoor climate and low energy costs.
This apartment is ideal for those who appreciate historical details and elegant decoration, but at the same time want to live in a home that meets modern requirements.

description:
Elegant, modern and furnished two bedroom apartment with south facing panoramic windows for rent. The apartment is placed on the second floor in a beautiful and well-maintained building with private parking and elevator by renowned architects, Schmidt Hammer Lassen. The whole apartment complex is secured by private surveillance cameras.

There are build-in closets in the hallway, a spacious living area with kitchen and dining area and a spacious bathroom with washer and dryer. The apartment boasts two bedrooms with plenty of closet space. One of the bedrooms is currently used as a home office but can be refurnished into a second bedroom if so desired. 
The apartment is very well planned out and suitable for one person or a couple. It is located within walking distance from the historical city center, either along the harbour at Langelinje by the little mermaid or through the beautiful and green area of the Citadel.

title: Central modern apartment with own rooftop terrace
description:
Available from June 1, 2025. 

A modern, stylish apartment located at the Harbour side, in central Copenhagen.

Perfect for the small family relocating or expats moving to Copenhagen for a limited time. There is a possibility for extension. 

/The apartment 
It is a two-bedroom apartment with three terraces, including a private rooftop terrace (approx. 60 m2) and the possibility to access two shared rooftop terraces. 

The apartment comes fully furnished with all needed kitchen wear and appliances, and further incl. dishwasher, washing machine, dryer etc. 

The building has elevator included, and it is possible to rent parking in the connected parking garage. 

/The neighbourhood
It is in a quiet neighbourhood within walking distance to "The Little Mermaid", Kastellet, and Kongens Nytorv. ‚Äã‚Äã‚ÄãThere is a opportunity for grocery shopping within 20 meters.

description:
Welcome to Valby, where you can live in this spacious, fully furnished studio apartment - where functionality meets Danish design. The studio has its own private bathroom & kitchen, and it is fully furnished so you avoid the stress of moving and have everything you need from day one. The studio is located in a building complex buzzing with life, and access to modern, common areas is included in your rent.

The studio is equipped with: 
‚Ä£ Bed & mattress (120 x 200 cm) 
‚Ä£ Desk 
‚Ä£ Storage cabinet 
‚Ä£ Fully equipped kitchen (oven, hob, fridge, freezer, extractor hood) 
‚Ä£ Private bathroom with shower 

Free access to community amenities: 
‚Ä£ Access to common areas including a lobby with seating and projector, reading room, meeting rooms 
‚Ä£ Roof terrace and courtyard garden 
‚Ä£ Atrium with cozy community atmosphere 
‚Ä£ Laundry room (washing: 20 kr. incl. soap, tumble drying: 15 kr.) 

About the building complex:

‚Ä£ Close to Valby Park, Valby Strand, and other green areas

‚Ä£ Close to Intercity train - easy access to Denmark's‚Äô biggest cities: Odense, √Örhus, Aalborg, Frederikshavn. Esbjerg, Herning 

By living in this building complex, you will also enjoy a lively community: 
‚Ä£ Dynamic, youthful environment ideal for building networks and friendships

This studio offers a perfect blend of personal comfort and vibrant community life, suited for anyone looking to enjoy a young, energetic living environment.  

The common areas in the building complex are buzzing with life ‚Äì here you can grab a coffee in the lobby, focus on deep work in one of the bookable meeting rooms, or just chill with a projector movie in our indoor cinema hall. While your beautifully designed studio is your personal hideaway, you will also have access to a community of other young people just like you.   

The studio is perfect for young professionals seeking a lively community atmosphere that fosters connections. Yep, that's what it's all about - taking your studio living experience to a whole new level ü§ùüè† Reach out to arrange a viewing!

title: A modern and bright 95 m2 four room apartment from 2005 with a balcony and a basement parking in Bohlendachsvej at Holmen - Christianshavn
description:
A modern and bright 95 m2 four room apartment from 2005 with a balcony and a basement parking in Bohlendachsvej at Holmen - Christianshavn - one of the most charming neighborhoods in Copenhagen, 450 metres from the Royal Opera, a three minutes wail from shopping and fitness and six minutes by bike to Kongens Nytorv.

From the entrance with space to hang outerwear you have access to all of the rooms. There is a combined dining and living room with access to the balcony facing the nice neighborhood. The nice and white kitchen is open to the dining area.

The three rooms can be used as bedrooms, study or guest room.

The bathroom has a shower and is equipped with a washer and a dryer.

In the basement you have a parking place and a storage room.

Available for 3 years from June 1st. for an expat or expat family

breadcrumb: Hjem > Lejligheder > K√∏benhavn > 4 v√¶relses > Hellerup > Hjem > Lejligheder > K√∏benhavn > 4 v√¶relses > Hellerup
title: 4 v√¶relses lejlighed i Hellerup
description:
Ejendommen
Velkommen til en nyindrettet perle midt i det eftertragtede Hellerup. Tidligere hjemsted for Egmont Magasiner, har denne smukke ejendom underg√•et en imponerende transformation, hvor PFA har forvandlet den til 35 eksklusive boliger.

Beliggende p√• en rummelig grund og omgivet af gr√∏nne og √•bne omr√•der, byder denne ejendom p√• en unik oase midt i byen. Med 4 etager og parkeringsmuligheder b√•de i k√¶lderen og g√•rden, tilbyder den ikke blot komfort, men ogs√• bekvemmelighed i hverdagen.

Boligerne
Tr√¶d ind i en verden af forskelligartede boliger, hver med deres eget unikke pr√¶g og charme. Fra hyggelige 2-v√¶relses til rummelige 5-v√¶relses lejligheder, sp√¶nder st√∏rrelserne fra 79 m2 til 168 m2, hvilket sikrer, at der er boliger til enhver smag og behov.

Med imponerende loftsh√∏jde og elevatorer i ejendommen, kombineres stil og funktionalitet p√• bedste vis. De fleste boliger nyder godt af solen p√• en sk√∏n syd- eller vestvendt altan eller terrasse, perfekt til afslapning og sociale stunder udend√∏rs.

Omr√•det
Beliggende i g√•afstand til Hellerup Strandvej, Hellerup Havn og det trendy shoppingcenter, Waterfront, har du alt inden for r√¶kkevidde. Nyd natursk√∏nne omgivelser med gr√∏nne parker som √òreg√•rdsparken, Bernstorffsparken og Charlottenlund Slotspark.

Med blot ca. 300 meter til Hellerup Station, hvorfra der afg√•r regionaltog og S-tog, samt cykelafstand til K√∏benhavns Centrum, er denne ejendom perfekt placeret for pendlere og bylivs-entusiaster.

Oplev den ultimative kombination af luksus, komfort og bekvemmelighed, n√•r du bos√¶tter dig i denne unikke ejendom i hjertet af Hellerup.

description:
Tr√¶d indenfor i Nobelholmens eksklusive boliger, hvor du bliver m√∏dt med den beroligende lyd af b√∏lgeskvulp og gennemg√•ende stilrene kvalitetsmaterialer. Her er der rig mulighed for at finde dit dr√∏mmehjem direkte ved vandet.

Mellem inderhavnen og kanalen med vand p√• begge sider finder du Kanalhusets eksklusive lejligheder i b√•de √©t og to plan. Her har stueetagens lejligheder alle egen badebro og direkte adgang til vandet, hvorfra du kan dyppe t√¶erne eller nyde en tur i kajakken i de sm√• hyggelige kanaler, der omgiver Nobelholmen p√• Enghave Brygge.

Karr√©bygningen er opf√∏rt i en klassisk u-form med sp√¶ndende variation i b√•de h√∏jde og facade. Det skaber et helt vidunderligt g√•rdrum, der f√∏les som en gr√∏n oase. Her er √•bent til vandet, og kanalernes sk√∏nne √∏-milj√∏. Tag elevatoren fra stuen til 8. etage og oplev de elegante lejligheders mange forskellige planl√∏sninger.

I boligens hjerte ‚Äì k√∏kkenalrummet ‚Äì indbyder det ikoniske Designa k√∏kken til kvalitetstid p√• alle tider af d√∏gnet. Den hvide bordplade sikrer et roligt udtryk og h√∏j funktionalitet, mens den gr√• vask giver modspil. K√∏kkenet er udstyret med alt i Siemens h√•rde hvidevarer, og er klar til at underst√∏tte dit n√¶ste madeventyr.

Der er selvf√∏lgelig gulvvarme i alle rum. I v√¶relserne og k√∏kkenalrummet er det Haros slidst√¶rke matlakerede premiumgulv i eg, der skaber et roligt nordisk udtryk. Badev√¶relserne har simple og elegante elementer fra Designa, med hvide klinker i bruseniche og moderne gr√• klinker, der skaber en rolig kontrast.

I k√¶lderetagen finder du lejlighedernes parkeringsfaciliteter og depotrum. Her er det muligt at leje en parkeringsplads eller parkere din cykel.

Der tages forbehold for fejl og evt. lejereguleringer.

description:
Lejlighederne kommer med forskellige planl√∏sninger. Nogle lejligheder har en lille entr√©, og i andre lejligheder tr√¶der man direkte ind i k√∏kken-alrummet. Du f√•r et godt og funktionelt indrettet badev√¶relse med separat bruseniche og vaskes√∏jle med kombineret vaskemaskine og t√∏rretumbler. Alt afh√¶ngig af lejlighedens st√∏rrelse er der 1 til 3 separate v√¶relser udover k√∏kken-alrummet. Der er depotrum tilg√¶ngeligt i n√¶sten alle lejem√•l bortset fra otte boliger, hvor depotrummet er udenfor lejem√•let.

Alle lejlighederne i stueetagen har egen terrasse  omkranset af  lille h√¶k. Ligeledes har alle lejligheder fra 1. sal og op en altan.

H√•rde hvidevarer
Der er alt i h√•rde hvidevarer samt en kombineret vaskemaskine og t√∏rretumbler.

Husdyr
Lejere kan ans√∏ge om tilladelse til at holde indekat og hund p√• adressen. Udekatte er ikke tilladt. Kontakt os for mere information.

Parkering
Der er i alt 129 p-pladser, hvoraf 41 er i parkeringsk√¶lder mens de resterende 88 ligger i terr√¶n. Af de 129 p-pladser er flere handicappladser og pladser forbeholdt el- og hybridbiler.

Elevator
Der er elevator i alle bygninger, som er h√∏jere end 2 etager. . Det vil sige, at nummer 6, 8 og 11 ikke har en elevator, hvorimod resten har.

F√¶lles arealer
Bygningerne danner til sammen rammen om et sk√∏nt omr√•de med gode hyggekroge, plads til at boltre sig samt mulighed for flere aktiviteter og boldspil. Imellem boligerne er der fine stier og opholdsrum med tr√¶er, h√∏je gr√¶sser samt andet vild og blomsterfuld beplantning for at fremme biodiversiteten. Der er ligeledes et b√•nd af marksten langs den prim√¶re sti igennem projektets omr√•de, som skaber en √¶stetisk flot LAR-l√∏sning til opsamling af regnvand. En fin legeplads bliver samlingspunktet for omr√•dets b√∏rn, hvor de kan lege og hygge sig sammen. Der er cykelparkering i alle de tre g√•rdmilj√∏er.

De viste billeder kan v√¶re fra et andet men tilsvarende lejem√•l i samme ejendom. Mindre afvigelser kan derfor forekomme.

description:

.

Omr√•det:

Badev√¶relset er bekl√¶dt med flotte store gr√• fliser, her er separat bruseniche og der er naturligvis indrettet med vaskemaskine og t√∏rretumbler. 

Bem√¶rk venligst, at billederne kan v√¶re fra en anden bolig, hvorfor indretning, beliggenhed og udsigt kan variere. Materialevalg og kvalitet er den samme for alle boliger i ejendommen. Se plantegningen for indretningen af denne bolig.

title: Modern Frederiksberg Studio with kitchen, loft & private terrace
description:
Welcome to Frederiksberg, where you can live in this spacious, fully furnished studio apartment - where functionality meets Danish design. The studio has its own private bathroom, kitchen loft and terrace, and it is fully furnished so you avoid the stress of moving and have everything you need from day one. The studio is located in a building complex buzzing with life, and access to modern, common areas is included in your rent. Located centrally in the heart of the Frederiksberg hip and classy neighborhood, with plenty of opportunities for a modern, active life. The lively Rantzausgade and V√¶rnedamsvej are both just around the corner - and did we mention it's only 10 min walk from the Lakes? Forum & Nuuks Plads Metro st. are both very close by, and R√•dhuspladsen /City Hall is only a 5 minute away metro-ride. 

*This studio is eligible for rent subsidy (boligst√∏tte), to help tenants reduce their living expenses through government assistance. 


The studio is equipped with: 

‚Ä£ Private bathroom with toilet and a separate shower. A large mirror, 1 shelf for storage and hooks for towels and a shower curtain.  
‚Ä£ Kitchen with oven, fridge, freezer & stove, cabinets with a sink and extractor hood. Prepared with socket for electrical appliances  
‚Ä£ Loft with bed 
‚Ä£ Terrace (6 sqm) 
‚Ä£ Working desk (60 cm x 100 cm) + 2 stools.
‚Ä£ 3 tall cabinets including shelves, hanger bar and 1 mirror 
‚Ä£ Bed, including a mattress and a mattress topper (140 cm x 200 cm) 
‚Ä£ Wall-mounted shelves, a wall lamp, ceiling lamp, blackout curtain and hooks for outerwear. 

Free access to community amenities: 
‚Ä£ Access to common areas including a lobby, reading room, meeting rooms 
‚Ä£ Free access to the fully equipped fitness (in-house) 
‚Ä£ Roof terrace and courtyard garden 
‚Ä£ Laundry room (washing: 20 kr. incl. soap, tumble drying: 15 kr.)  

About the building complex: 
‚Ä£ Located in UMEUS Frederiksberg, on B√ºlowsvej 
‚Ä£ Proximity to Forum Metro (700 meters away) - 5 min to Copenhagen City Centre 
‚Ä£ Frederiksberg Centre 1 km away from your doorstep 
‚Ä£ Restaurants, parks, caf√©s and plenty of shopping around 

Community Life: 
‚Ä£ Dynamic, youthful environment ideal for building networks and friendships 
‚Ä£ Community manager on-site for support with lease, maintenance, or event planning 

This studio offers a perfect blend of personal comfort and vibrant community life, suited for anyone looking to enjoy a young, energetic living environment.  

The common areas in the building complex are buzzing with life ‚Äì here you can grab a coffee in the lobby, focus on deep work in one of the bookable meeting rooms, train in the fully-equipped gym or just chill on the rooftop with views over Copenhagen. While your beautifully designed studio is your personal hideaway, you will also have access to a community of other young people just like you.   

The studio is perfect for young professionals seeking a lively community atmosphere that fosters connections. Yep, that's what it's all about - taking your studio living experience to a whole new level ü§ùüè† Reach out to arrange a viewing!

description:

Omr√•det er kendetegnet ved de mange kanaler, slusen og havnel√∏bet der sammen med de mange sm√• b√•dklubber samt havnebadet giver en sk√∏n maritim stemning. INFO : I 2024 kommet den nye metro M4, som k√∏rer direkte til Orientkat i Nordhavn (CIS), hvor det n√¶rmeste stop er blot 5 min. p√• g√•ben fra lejligheden, som g√∏r det endnu lettere at komme ind til centrum.

2-storey townhouse apartment with large private roof terrace for rent for 3-4 years.
This apartment offers 166 sqm with rooms on the ground floor and living space on the first floor + 43 sqm roof terrace where you can enjoy the sun in peace and quiet. You are located on Copenhagen's attractive harbour front - Sluseholmen. The area is ideally located whether you work in or outside the city. 
The apartment contains: Spacious entrance hall with stairs to the first floor, 3 good bedrooms and a bathroom with shower and laundry facilities. The 1st floor offers a guest toilet, office area and a large kitchen-dining room in connection with the living room. Here there is an extra ceiling height (approx. 5 m) and floor-to-ceiling windows that provide fantastic light and a good view of the canals and the harbour.
Parking space with the possibility of Clever electric charger in the basement and a boat mooring can be rented.
There is a short distance to the motorway & airport, a few minutes to the S-train and the inner city is just a short block away. The area is characterised by the many canals, the lock and the harbour circuit, which together with the many small boat clubs and the harbour baths create a wonderful maritime atmosphere. INFO : In 2024, the new metro M4 had arrived, running directly to Orientkat in Nordhavn (CIS), with the nearest stop just a 5-minute walk from the apartment. on foot from the apartment, making it even easier to get into the city centre.

description:
This spacious modern studio for 1 person, is located right by the water in Nordhavn. When staying at us, you will get access to all the facilities that you will need. 

What‚Äôs inside? 

Private bathroom with toilet and a separate shower. A large mirror, 1 shelf for storage and hooks for towels and a shower curtain.  

Kitchenette; Cabinets with a sink, extractor hood, oven, stove and refrigerator. Prepared with socket for electrical appliances  

Working desk (60 cm x 100 cm) 

3 tall cabinets including shelves, hanger bar and 1 mirror 

Bed with 2 pull-out drawers, including a mattress and a mattress topper (120 cm x 200 cm) 

The studio further comes with wall-mounted shelves, a wall lamp, a hook for a ceiling lamp of your own, roller blinds and hooks for outerwear. 

On top of that, you will get access to:‚ÄØ‚ÄØ 
- Fitness: fully equipped gym included in the rent 
- Rooftop terrace‚ÄØ 
- Laundry room‚ÄØ(paid over rent)‚ÄØ 
- Group rooms you can book‚ÄØthrough our app 
- Study hall‚ÄØ‚ÄØ 
- Nordhavn Metro is close by  
- Community Manager on site to help with all questions 
- Events ‚Äì you can take part in our social events and the running club and creative club.

About: 

The dorm offers co-living in Copenhagen. Located centrally in the district of Nordhavn with plenty of opportunities to enjoy an active life.
Just around the corner you will find caf√©s, restaurants and supermarkets. Or go and visit the cinema or the rooftop gym across the street. 

The heart of the dorm is the community: the majority of the residents live across 14 communal kitchens. The communal kitchens are designed to create the best framework for communities. Whether you want to cook together or have a movie night, grab a beer or play board games together - this is where it happens.

description:
Lidt til h√∏jre efter Langebro ligger Islands Brygge med ansigtet lige ud imod K√∏benhavns Havn. Langs Bryggen finder man den popul√¶re havnepark med legeplads, solmur, rullesk√∏jtebane og ikke mindst havnebadet, der summer af liv i de varme sommerdage. Fra Havneparken kan man krydse Islands Brygge og via den gr√∏nne kile spadsere ud over Amager F√¶lleds fredede naturomr√•der. Man kan ogs√• krydse havnen mellem Islands Brygge og Fisketorvet; Bryggebroen giver nem og hurtig adgang til shopping og S-tog. I stueplan er der etableret cykelparkering, f√¶llesvaskeri, affaldsrum til storskrald, postkasser, vicev√¶rtkontor samt f√¶llesrum og toilet.Der er porttelefonsystem ved husets to hovedindgange, og p√• hver etage er der nedfaldsskaktsystem.

P√• 13. etage er der en 230 m¬≤ stor f√¶lles tagterrasse til husets beboere. Her kan soles, luftes og ikke mindst udsigten, nydes i fulde drag.

Til ejendommen h√∏rer ca. 70 parkeringspladser p√• terr√¶n, som pt. er til fri afbenyttelse efter princippet f√∏rst til m√∏lle. Herudover er der mulighed for at leje parkeringsplads i p-k√¶lder p√• den n√¶rliggende Erik Eriksens Gade. Det er muligt at leje b√•dplads i den nye lystb√•dehavn ved henvendelse til B√•delaug Havnestad.

Boligerne i ejendommen varierer fra 68 ‚Äì 152 m¬≤ fordelt p√• over 50 forskellige typer. Alle boligerne er indrettet med store karnapper med vinduer fra gulv til loft p√• alle sider. De bidrager til det organiske facadeudtryk og giver mulighed for at tr√¶de ud i det bl√• og nyde lyset og udsigten i fulde drag. Karnappernes vinduer kan √•bnes, s√• der skabes en afsk√¶rmet altan. De fleste boliger har √©n eller to altaner. De h√∏jtliggende stuelejligheder har terrasse, og p√• toppen er der et udvalg af boliger med tagterrasser. Til lejligheder uden depotrum i selve lejligheden er der pulterrum i k√¶lder.

description:
Velkommen til Kobbelv√¶nget!

Fra entreen er der adgang til de to v√¶relser, badev√¶relset og det hyggelige opholdsrum. I det store sovev√¶relse finder i tre indbyggede skabe. Badev√¶relset byder p√• gulvvarme, separat bruseniche og vaskes√∏jle. I lejem√•lets hyggelige opholdsrum er der plads til b√•de k√∏kken alrum og stue samt adgang til altanen.
Her kommer I til at bo i en unik og sp√¶ndende ny bydel med et stort potentiale. Projektet er en omdannelse og revitalisering af et gammelt industrikvarter til et levende og mangfoldigt beboelses- og erhvervsomr√•de.

Begge v√¶relser er af en s√•dan st√∏rrelse, at de kan indrettes efter behov og begge med panoramavinduer med enest√•ende udsigt til kanalerne. 

Badev√¶relset er i tr√•d med resten af lejligheden, l√¶kkert og rummeligt med v√¶gh√¶ngt toilet og stor bruseniche samt vaske/t√∏rremaskine.

Alt i alt en vidunderlig lejlighed t√¶t p√• indre by, i sk√∏nne og afslappende omgivelser. 

****

From the moment you step inside, you will experience a sense of quality, spaciousness, and exclusivity.

This apartment is conveniently located close to the metro station (Havneholmen), shopping options (such as Fisketorvet), and cozy caf√©s.

The breathtaking view extends down the canals, over the city‚Äôs rooftops, and directly towards the historic warehouse. Natural light floods the space, creating a bright and inviting atmosphere. The surrounding area is fully developed, featuring elegant wooden structures along the waterfront, boat docks, lush maritime landscaping, and numerous recreational spots.

The apartment offers a well-designed 93 square meters, starting with a spacious entrance hall that flows seamlessly into the bright open-plan kitchen and living area, with room for a large dining table and sofa arrangement.

The kitchen is both stylish and practical, with ample cabinet space for optimal storage, light-colored fronts, and a sleek countertop.

Adjacent to the living room is one of the two bedrooms, featuring a large built-in wardrobe and enough space for a double bed and a home office setup. The second bedroom is located at the corner of the apartment and has direct access to the west- and north-facing balcony, where you can enjoy stunning sunsets and warm summer evenings.

Both bedrooms are generously sized, allowing for flexible furnishing options, and each boasts floor-to-ceiling panoramic windows with exceptional views of the canals.

The bathroom is in line with the rest of the apartment‚Äîmodern and spacious, with a wall-mounted toilet, a large shower area, and a combined washer/dryer.

The apartment features beautiful light-colored plank flooring and, of course, underfloor heating throughout.

All in all, a wonderful apartment close to the city center, set in beautiful and relaxing surroundings.

title: Apartment in central and hip N√∏rrebro with balcony
description:
Looking for short term renters from 20th of march ( one or two months, while I am out traveling myself.
 


Welcome to this completely newly renovated Copenhagen apartment, located in the heart of vibrant N√∏rrebro. This spacious, modern home has been carefully renovated to combine contemporary comfort with the charm of a classic Copenhagen apartment, featuring high ceilings and timeless details. The brand new kitchen is equipped with the latest high-end appliances, including a dishwasher, washing machine, and more. The large living area offers a comfortable sofa, perfect for relaxing, as well as plenty of space to eat, work, or unwind.

With a dedicated area for working and a peaceful, quiet environment, this apartment is perfect for longer stays, especially for those who need to work during their visit. You‚Äôll find everything you need to settle in and be productive while enjoying the comfort of your temporary home.

Enjoy a huge balcony where you can take in peaceful Copenhagen mornings, afternoons, and vibrant Copenhagen nights, all while sipping a glass of wine, enjoying a cup of coffee, or reading a book.

The apartment also boasts a newly renovated bathroom with a separate shower room, a rare feature in traditional Copenhagen apartments.

With one of the best locations in the city, you're just steps away from Rantzausgade, in the heart of N√∏rrebro. This area is known for its trendy cafes, restaurants, natural wine bars, and craft beer spots. Just a few places to mention: K√∏lsters Tolv Haner, Baka de Busk, and Coffee Collective. You can also enjoy peaceful walks in the nearby Assistens Cemetery, a beautiful spot year-round. The apartment is tucked away on a side street off Rantzausgade, ensuring you won‚Äôt be disturbed by any noise during your stay. Plus, with S√∏erne, Frederiksberg, and Vesterbro just a short walk away, you‚Äôll be right in the middle of it all. You can even complete the "Copenhagen experience" by borrowing a bike just around the corner!

I love helping my guests have the best experience, so feel free to ask me anything! I'm a passionate traveler myself, and the only thing I ask is that you take good care of this beautiful apartment while enjoying your stay!

description:

 Denne unikke 5-v√¶relses lejlighed i Tingbjerg byder p√• en charmerende planl√∏sning, der giver masser af muligheder for at tilpasse hjemmet til dine behov. Ejendommen: 

Tingbjerget er opf√∏rt med de karakteristiske gule teglsten og er designet med stor respekt for den oprindelige arkitektur, som Steen Ejlers Rasmussen skabte i 1940‚Äôerne. Det er en moderne fortolkning af de visioner, der dengang var med til at pr√¶ge den s√¶rlige og unikke bydel. Ejendommens g√•rd har et smukt gr√∏nt omr√•de, der vil blive beplantet med 600 tr√¶er. Der er desuden en naturlegeplads til b√∏rnene, et f√¶llesrum for beboerne, samt faciliteter som en b√•lplads og en parkourbane.

Tingbjerg er en livlig bydel t√¶t p√• K√∏benhavns centrum, hvor du kan opleve b√•de det pulserende byliv og natursk√∏nne omgivelser. Med nem adgang til offentlig transport er det hurtigt at komme rundt i byen. Omr√•det byder p√• flotte gr√∏nne omr√•der og en rolig, natursk√∏n atmosf√¶re, der appellerer til b√•de familier og aktive personer. Derudover ligger omr√•det t√¶t p√• motorvejsafk√∏rsler, hvilket giver nem og hurtig adgang til K√∏benhavn, der kun ligger 10 minutter v√¶k i bil. Samtidig gennemg√•r Tingbjerg en sp√¶ndende udvikling, hvor moderne arkitektur og historisk charme smelter sammen. Beliggenheden er ideel for dem, der √∏nsker at kombinere byens puls med naturens ro.

title: Fully Furnished Hotel Apartment
description:
Fully furnished exclusive apartment with plenty space and catering for four persons.  

Easy and ready to move in with fully functional kitchen dishwater, washing machine, dryer and all the utilities and kitchen equipment you need for a long-term stay.

It comes with elevated king size bed in master bedroom, two single beds that can be turned into a double king size, plenty of storage and closet space, large Livingroom sofa and dining area for 6 persons.

You find everything you need from bed linen, towels, TV, high speed Internet, etc.

The location is in an exclusive, cozy, and super convenient neighborhood with all the groceries stores, bakery, restaurants, cafes, salons, etc.

There is free parking all around the building, train station is 6 min walk, bus 1 min walk that can take you into central Copenhagen within 20 minutes.

Within 5 K you have beaches, harbor, beautiful parks, shopping center with cafes, restaurants, and a very nice cinema.

You are welcome to see the apartment and meet with the current tenants.

High speed wifi and TV package is included in rent.

NOTE: The images are of a similar residence and property in Carlsberg Byen. The floor plan is accurate.

An exclusive, newly built, and spacious 2-room apartment is now available for rent in the popular Carlsberg Byen, located in H√∏ffings T√•rn.

The apartment features an optimal layout, making full use of every square meter. Upon entering, you step into the kitchen area, which has space for a dining table. The kitchen, designed by HTH, has a sleek and minimalist aesthetic with a handleless design, a white countertop, and built-in appliances from Miele. From the kitchen and dining area, you have direct access to the apartment‚Äôs French balcony with a folding door‚Äîor through the bedroom‚Äîallowing you to enjoy a view of the rest of Copenhagen.

The kitchen flows seamlessly into the living room, which is set back from the entrance, creating depth and a natural flow throughout the apartment. Adjacent to the living room, you will find the bedroom.
The bathroom is designed with drawer modules, a laundry tower (washing machine and dryer from Miele), and a sink in artificial marble from Marmorline. The walls and floors of the bathroom are adorned with pastel green Mosa tiles.
Overall, this apartment is executed in a minimalist and Nordic style, with great attention to aesthetics. The flooring consists of white-pigmented, lacquered oak planks from BOEN, featuring underfloor heating throughout the entire apartment. The fixtures are from Grohe, and all appliances are from Miele.

Included in the apartment: All appliances, washing machine, dryer, dishwasher, oven, and cooktop.

Included in the property: Basement storage, bicycle storage, and a courtyard area. Parking spaces are available for rent.

title: Exceptionally well located apartment in the first row to Copenhagen's harbor!
description:
Welcome to Herluf Trolles Gade!

For dansk tekst; se sidst i annoncen.

Here you will find an apartment in a class of its own, measuring 159 square meters, and is located in the first row to Copenhagen's harbor in what can be described as one of Copenhagen's most central and best locations. This provides an astonishing amenity value.

The apartment has been modernized, and has a stately feel.

You enter a large entrance hall where there are two smaller storage rooms for storing outerwear or anything else that needs to be put away.

From the entrance you can access a large bathroom with separate shower. In addition, from the entrance there is access to a very extraordinary utility room, which contains closet space, sink and washer and dryer.

In the second part of the apartment, there is a large kitchen, located in an orval room, where there is plenty of space to place a large dining table. Next, the apartment has two large living rooms, one of which can optimally be used as a sofa room, and the other as a dining room. Both rooms are located with a view of the wonderful Copenhagen harbor, and have a fantastic light.

Finally, the apartment has two large bedrooms, where there is plenty of space to have a bed, closets, desk, etc. One bedroom is located overlooking Copenhagen's harbor.

This is a fantastic apartment, which is some of the absolute best Copenhagen has to offer.

_______________________________________

Absolutely fantastic large 2V, 109 m2 penthouse apartment in Gemini Residence "Silo" is rented out.

The apartment is at the top of the Gemini Residence.

This apartment has no residency requirement and is perfect as a commuter apartment for people who work in Copenhagen but have permanent residence elsewhere.

(Historically, all new apartments have been without a residency requirement until the first person registers their residence and the apartment will then always be with a residency requirement. Copenhagen has stopped with a residency requirement. Apartments without a residency requirement make it possible to use the apartment and have an address registered at another address. I plan to live abroad one day in the future and live in this apartment when I stay in Denmark for some periods. Therefore, the apartment must still be without a residency requirement).

With the apartment can be included in private parking space with private electric charger in the basement, approx. 10 meters from the glass elevator. Parking space costs DKK 1,000.00 per day. month.

Super central, within walking distance to the metro, the harbor bath and the charming "old" brew with cafes, small specialty shops, etc. In addition, close to City Hall Square, Christianshavn. The shopping center Fisketorvet is located just across the other side with access via bicycle bridge.

Large living room with design sofa arrangement, new large TV, broadband internet, dining table with design chairs, well integrated with nice and complete bright luxury kitchen with all equipment (plates, pots, glass etc.). Everything for the bedroom is included, including duvets, pillows and sheets, etc.

Note: The apartment can potentially also be rented unfurnished.

Large bedroom with wardrobe.

Lovely bathroom with washing machine and dryer. Shower with glass door.

In short, nothing is missing before moving in.

I am responsible for the practical payment of electricity, TV, internet and heat, etc., so you have to do nothing but move in with your personal belongings and simply pay monthly rent.

Possibility of borrowing free kayaks in properties.

Viewing can be arranged at anytime you wish, but preferably Saturday or Sunday from 2:00 PM.

Please do not hesistate to write to me or send an sms

Best regards Soren

√ÖBENT HUS:
Bakkek√¶ret:

title: Unik 4-v√¶relses lejlighed i Charlottenlund
description:

Dette lejem√•l er et sj√¶ldent fund, hvor du har muligheden for at leje noget helt unikt og i en smuk historisk bygning, der tidligere har tilh√∏rt den katolske kirke. I 1800-tallet var Polly Berling, tidligere ejer af Berlingske Tidende, en markant skikkelse. I 1869 konverterede hun til den katolske tro, og efter sin mands d√∏d to √•r senere √∏nskede hun at √¶re sin nye tro ved at skabe noget meningsfuldt. Hendes vision var klar: en katolsk skole og kirke for drenge. Med k√∏bet af landstedet Ordrupsh√∏j i 1863 l√• grundstenene til hendes dr√∏m allerede klar. I 1873 stod den smukke arkitekttegnede skole og kirke endelig f√¶rdig p√• Ordrupsh√∏j. Nu, n√¶sten 150 √•r senere, st√•r dette historiske monument som et tidl√∏st symbol p√• Polly Berlings engagement og vision. En del af dette historiske kompleks er nu blevet omformet til fem eksklusive lejeboliger af enest√•ende karakter.

title: Bright Apartment with Floor Heating
description:
(English Description can be found at bottom) 

I forl√¶ngelse af Gentoftegade ligger Kongelysvej, en lille blind vej , godt beskyttet mod Lyngbyvejens trafik og st√∏j, men samtidig n√¶r til alt , herunder busser, tog, indk√∏b og postkontor. 

Ejendommen er fra 1937 og den blev i 2003/4 gennemrenoveret fra k√¶lder til kvist med nyindretning af ejerlejligheder. Ny maling fra 2025. Lejligheden der er p√• 119 m2 og 4 v√¶relser, er enkelt og funktionelt disponeret, med et moderne og tiltalende pr√¶g . Der er h√∏jt til loftet i alle rum, aske parket p√• gulvene og gulvvarme overalt. Fra entreen g√•r man gennem en glasd√∏r ind i den ca. 45 m2 store dagligstue, der p√• elegant vis er i √•ben kontakt med det moderne k√∏kken udf√∏rt med Hanstholm elementer og mahogni bordplade. Stuen som er det naturlige samlingspunkt i lejligheden har forbindelse til den store sydvest vendte altan p√• ca 10 m2, sovev√¶relset med indbyggede skabe og det ene af de 2 b√∏rnev√¶relser. Det andet b√∏rnev√¶relse, samt det store badev√¶relse med bord af granit tilg√•s fra entreen. 

Alle h√•rde hvidevarer medf√∏lger (komfur, ovn, k√∏l, frys, opvask, vask og t√∏rretumbler).
Til lejligheden h√∏rer egen parkeringsplads og eget k√¶lderrum, foruden del i f√¶lles
k√¶lderrum. Ejendommen er omkranset af b√∏geh√¶k og lindetr√¶er.

Som udlejere har vi haft flere lejere gennem √•rene, altid med gensidig respekt, og alle har forladt huset tilfredse. Her er, hvad en tidligere lejer skrev:

"Endnu en gang vil jeg gerne udtrykke min dybf√∏lte taknemmelighed for jeres vedvarende st√∏tte gennem √•rene og for at v√¶re s√• venlige og im√∏dekommende udlejere. "
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

In continuation of Gentoftegade, Kongelysvej, a small blind road, is well protected from Lyngbyvejens traffic and noise, but at the same time close to everything, including buses, trains, shopping and post office. The property is from 1937 and it was refurbished from basement to roof in 2003/4 with new features of condominiums. New Paint from 2025.  

The apartment is 119 m2 and 4 rooms are easily and functionally disposed, with a modern and attractive touch. There is high ceilings in all rooms, ash parked on the floors and underfloor heating throughout. From the entrance you go through one glass door into it approx. 45 m2 large living room, which is elegantly open in open contact with it modern kitchen made with Hanstholm elements and mahogany countertops. The living room that is The natural focal point of the apartment is connected to the large southwest facing balcony of about 10 m2 , the bedroom with fitted wardrobes and one of the 2 children\'s rooms. The another children\'s room, as well as the large bathroom with granite table accessed from the entrance hall. 

All White goods included (stove, oven, fridge, freezer, dishwasher, all in one washing machine and tumble dryer). The apartment has its own car park and own cellar, in addition to shared facilities basement. The property is surrounded by beech hedges and linden trees.

As landlord, I have hosted several tenants over the years, always with mutual respect, and all have left the house satisfied. Here‚Äôs what one of my former tenants had to say:

"Once again, I would like to express my heartfelt gratitude for your unwavering support over the years and for being such a kind and friendly landlord. "

title: Spacious 4 rooms new 128 m2 apartment
description:
The apartment is on the 11th floor with a south-west facing living room and a spacious balcony - it gives a beautiful view directly over the city and parks!

You enter a beautiful and spacious entrance hall, which gives access to your large living room with an open kitchen. 
The entrance also gives access to a guest toilet/bathroom and a spacious bedroom that could be a guest bedroom or bed room for grown up kids. 
The master bedroom comes with a walk-in closet and attached toilet/bathroom and washing machine & dryer.
In addition, there is a small room besides master bedroom, which could be used as a child room or study/work room or simply as an extension of the living room. 

The area is surrounded by beautiful parks and gardens for a walk, jog, or a family picnic - JC Jacobsens Have, Enghave Parken, S√∏ndermarken, and Frederiksberg Have.

For families with children, there are many good children institutions right in the backyard and the famous European School Copenhagen is at a walkable distance. There are lots of wonderful playgrounds, free time activity centers for children, sports/fitness centers nearby. Copenhagen Zoo is like 15-20 minutes walk from the apartment - yes, we could go on.

There are 3 big supermarkets within 2 minutes walk. Resturants, rooftop bars, cafes, bakeries, spa, shops are all located within 5 minutes walk. 

The apartment location is super convenient, you can easily take S-Train (Carlsberg Byen Station), Buses, and Metro-train (Enghave Plads Metro). Within 5 minutes you can reach Central Train station and Tivoli. 

The apartment comes with a big storage room in the basement. 
There is paid Car parking available very conveniently under the apartment tower. 

The apartment is rented out for a maximum of 24 months (with a possibility to renew), but less duration can also be agreed.

his exclusive 129m2 apartment is located on the 1st floor of Kjeldahl House, which is located in an attractive location in Carlsberg Byen.  Carslebrg Byen offers a broad variate of cafes, restaurants, shopping possibilities and and in walking distance to the S-train and metro. 

The building was build in 2021, is accessible through an elevator and is the ideal apartment for a family looking for comfort and space. The floor plan has a large living space with an open kitchen + 4 additional (bed)rooms, 2 modern bathrooms, a balcony and a unique small terrace overlooking a small, shared grass area.
The apartment gets a lot of light, has exclusive herringbone floors and the kitchen is equipped with high end equipment from Miele and a Quooker. 

The apartment is unfurnished. Initial rental period is up to 2 years, with possibility to extend.

Pets and smoking is NOT allowed. 

NOTE: 
- THE PHOTOS ARE OF A MODEL APARTMENT.
- VIDEO is representative of same size apartment in the building, from a higher floor

title: 3 v√¶relses lejlighed p√• Islands Brygge i K√∏benhavn S udlejes
description:
Gemini er latin og betyder tvillinger, og det giver jo meget god mening, n√•r man ser p√• den gamle fr√∏silo p√• Islands Brygge. Gemini Residence, kaldes siloen i dag, som nok er mere siamesiske tvillinger end bare tvillinger, for siloerne i den gamle sojakagefabrik fletter sig ind i hinanden i et arkitektonisk mesterv√¶rk. 84 lejligheder er her, alle bygget uden p√• siloerne, og de kunne ikke ligge bedre i deres eget 8-tal lige ved Bryggebroen og lige over for Fisketorvet.¬†¬†
Alle 143 m2 er vendt mod vandet. Det samme er terrassen, der er lang som lejligheden og har sol fra morgen til aften. Gemini Residence stod f√¶rdig i 2005. Det indvendige af 8-tallet er en tom skal med foyer, trapper og elevator, og det hele ligger under et gennemsigtigt tag. Det er nyt√¶nkning, der vil noget. Kvarteret med den gamle sojakagefabrik er omd√∏bt til Havnestad, hvor en del af de gamle bygninger enten er restaureret eller ombygget. Gemini Residence, Pressesiloen, Zeppelinerhallen og Wennbergsiloen er nogle af dem. 
De er alle b√∏rn af et slidt, industrielt omr√•de, men Islands Brygge har de sidste snart 25 √•r udviklet sig til det mest hippe og eftertragtede kvarter. Fra at vende ryggen til vandet, vender det i dag krop og ansigt mod K√∏benhavn p√• den anden side af vandet. Kreativ byplanl√¶gning med havnebad og promenadeliv g√∏r, at Bryggen og Havnestad i dag st√•r som et raffineret miks af moderne byliv med n√¶rmilj√∏, caf√©er og l√¶kre butikker. Byens bedste kulturtilbud er lige p√• den anden side af vandet. Bryggen har rammerne, som med broer og havnebus forbinder det bedste af alt. 
Ledige P-pladser er der ikke mange af p√• Bryggen, men som lejer f√∏lger der en parkeringsplads med. Den ligger under ejendommen med elevator op til lejligheden. Det er ikke biler, der dominerer Bryggen, det er cykler og ladcykler derimod, p√• cykelstier med indk√∏bsposer, b√∏rn og k√¶rester som uskyldsrene passagerer p√• ladet.
‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî
Gemini is Latin and means twins, and it makes a lot of sense when you look at the old seed silo at Islands Brygge. Gemini Residence, as the silo is called today, is probably more Siamese twins than just twins, because the silos in the old soy cake factory intertwine in an architectural masterpiece. There are 84 apartments here, all built on the outside of the silos, and they couldn‚Äôt be better located right by Bryggebroen and right across from Fisketorvet.
All 143 m2 face the water. So does the terrace, which is as long as the apartment and has sun from morning to evening. Gemini Residence was completed in 2005. The inside of the silos is an empty shell with a foyer, stairs and elevator, and it‚Äôs all under a transparent roof. It‚Äôs innovation that matters. The neighborhood with the old soy cake factory has been renamed Havnestad, where some of the old buildings have either been restored or rebuilt. 
in the last 25 years Islands Brygge has developed into the hippest and most sought-after neighborhood. From turning its back on the water, it now faces Copenhagen on the other side of the water. Creative urban planning with a harbor bath and promenade means that Bryggen and Havnestad today stand as a refined mix of modern city life with local environment, cafes and delicious shops. The city‚Äôs best cultural offerings are just on the other side of the water. Bryggen has the framework that, with bridges and the harbor bus, connects the best of everything.
There are not many vacant parking spaces at Bryggen, but as a tenant, a parking space is included. It is located under the property with an elevator up to the apartment.
